comment.body: I like that all the word start with capital letters, except will, because no one likes William.
Yeah, fuck them! BTW, I like your sexual identity.
@Quantumworld: Man, where do you get your news? To get a mark of a total conspiracy nut, all you need to do is say that the Earth is flat.
@Quantumworld: That's an idea I can fight for. Donuts are delicious.

@Quantumworld: I think that other social networks don't look so bad in the eyes of their users, because they are used to the restrictions and I don't think spam is a good idea, it would create bad image for ZeroNet and its users, it would just scare people away.
Yeah, God (the christian one) is very moody.
If your phone is rooted, it shouldn't take longer than a few minutes of searching online with search engine of your choice.

@Styromaniac: Assuming your phone has init.d support, create a script to start what you need and put it into /data/local/userinit.sh , I'm not sure if the location will work for your ROM, it may be specific for my ROM (Resurrection Remix Pie).
